name: Residents
description:
RESIDENTS

Residents is a unique tower defense game prototype made within one week for the Brackeys 2021 2. game jam.

Story

You are breeding chickens on an alien world. Your friends, fellow aliens, are very hard working fellas. On the daytime, they will work, but at nightime, there are rumors that they are acting crazy...

How To Play

Your goal is to defend your chickens for the aliens by building towers.

Click on the building tower button to select a building, then place it on the map. Don't forget to upgrade your towers!

If you are out of gold or you are done with building, click on the CHAOS button to switch to nightime.

You can move the camera with your mouse, zoom with the scrollwheel, rotate camera angle by holding the right mouse button. Place the buildings with left mouse button, cancel building with the right mouse button.

Credits

I did all the coding and 3d moddeling. I used some audio files and 2d sprite files from elsewhere:
